page.title: 14Brookfield Farm hypermarket
page.content: Brookfield farm is a large hypermarket with a petrol station, a free car park for 630 cars, a coffee shop and a small parade of other shops. Tescos is built with red bricks and tiles. It looks like a village and is surrounded by trees and grass with beds of shrubs. It is outside the town centre, alongside the A10 road. It has a sales area of 39,600 square feet. It employs 400 people and their are 33 checkouts. It sells food, clothes and shoes, gardening equipment, DIY equipment, toys and books, housewares and plants. The people who use it come from a large area. Some people we asked came from 10 miles away. Most people get there by car or the free bus service. Most people liked it but some just used it for convenience.
